actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Patents, Copyrights and Trademarks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Patents, Copyrights and Trademarks

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Commerce through the Patent and Trademark Office to reexamine patent application numbered 179,474 filed by Joseph W. Newman in August 1980, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to reexamine and reconsider a named individual's specified patent application.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Commerce through the Patent and Trademark Office to reexamine patent application numbered 179,474 filed by Joseph W. Newman in August 1980, and for other purposes.
